scripts.ios: vite build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.ios-debug: vite build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios --target=00008110-001248360E33801E --livereload
scripts.ios-emulator: vite build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios --target=emulator --livereload
scripts.browser: vite build && npx cap sync && npx cap serve
scripts.android-build: vite build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.android-device: vite build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android --target=device
scripts.android: vite build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
